wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Andre Nuttall (born 27 January 1997) is an English professional footballer who plays as a striker for Blackpool. He has previously played for Aberdeen, Stranraer, Dumbarton, Blackburn Rovers and Northampton Town.

response: On 22 July Rovers announced the signing of striker Joe Nuttall following a successful trial scoring 5 goals in 2 games for the u23s, on a 12-month deal with option of a further 12 months, he was a free agent following his release from Aberdeen.
On 18 January Rovers announced that striker Joe Nuttall has signed a new 3 a half year deal, until 2021.
